verses.name: Romans 6:14
verses.text: For sin shall not have dominion over you: for ye are not under the law, but under grace.

verses.name: Romans 6:15
verses.text: What then? shall we sin, because we are not under the law, but under grace? God forbid.

verses.name: Romans 6:16
verses.text: Know ye not, that to whom ye yield yourselves servants to obey, his servants ye are to whom ye obey; whether of sin unto death, or of obedience unto righteousness?

verses.name: Romans 6:17
verses.text: But God be thanked, that ye were the servants of sin, but ye have obeyed from the heart that form of doctrine which was delivered you.
